article: One day, four lawyers were riding along a country road. There had been a(n)  _  , and the ground was soft. The lawyers rode  _  , talking and laughing. In a few minutes they had  forgotten about  the birds. But the fourth lawyer, whose name was Abraham Lincoln,  _  . He got down from his  _  and gently took the little ones up. They didn't seem  _  , but chirped softly, as if they knew they were safe. "Never  _  , my little fellows," said Mr. Lincoln. Then he looked up to find the nest from which they had  _  .
